recipes.lychee.item_inside.charoite.cond: Converts around Noon (3:20 - 6:40). Reverts if left out too long...
recipes.lychee.item_inside.moonstone.con: Converts around Midnight (13:20 - 16:40). Reverts if left out too long...
chapter.welcome.quest.2.description.2: FTB Chunks allows you to &4claim chunks&r to &4protect&r your blocks. It also has a &9minimap and large map&r ! You can find it in the top left corner of your inventory. &6Right-click&r anywhere in map to create a waypoint. &6Right-click&r on waypoints and death points to edit or delete them. Click on &1Claimed Chunks button&r, then left or &6right-click&r on map to select chunks that will belong to you. &6Shift-left&r or &6right-click&r on claimed chunks to toggle forceloading
